mainText:
Steve, we needed you. You inspire us, younger generation to be perfect in
whatever profession we are. To bring forward our best, each time. Man, you
were the best of best.
You made sense in this world of so much non-sense, every product I've used
from Apple, has brought joy to me and my family, we all are a great fan of
you. Rest in peace and be sure to come back again, after enough rest. Apple
engineers and employees, please do not let Steve's vision tarnish in future.

God bless greatest soul on earth!
header: May Steve come back in another body
author: Anonymous
